info.name: Pinterest: Hide nag
info.description: Pinterest normally has a huge nag box that covers a large portion of the screen, asking you to sign up or log in. This style removes that and allows you to browse Pinterest without logging in.
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.3: Updated to work with new version of Pinterest (Oct. 14, 2014) Version 1.2: Updated to work with a new version of Pinterest (Oct. 5, 2013) Version 1.1: Removed extra spacing where the nag used to be Version 1: initial release This will probably break with any pinterest updates. Released with the Unlicense.

data.title: out of date; try this style...
